title: Breakingviews TV: Good Gun Co
text:
Breakingviews TV: Good Gun Co Wednesday, March 28, 2018 - 04:43 
With reluctant lenders and accidental owners wanting an exit from the storied arms manufacturer Remington after it emerges from bankruptcy, Rob Cox sees a prime opportunity for a billionaire to swoop in and make Remington out to be the firearms industry's good guy with a gun.   
With reluctant lenders and accidental owners wanting an exit from the storied arms manufacturer Remington after it emerges from bankruptcy, Rob Cox sees a prime opportunity for a billionaire to swoop in and make Remington out to be the firearms industry's good guy with a gun.  //reut.rs/2pLtDJg
